entry.tran: 犹大；出卖朋友（或国家）的人；叛徒
entry.def: If you accuse someone of being a Judas, you are accusing them of being deceitful and betraying their friends or country.

example.ex: It was a pulsating session in which a member of the audience shouted 'Judas' at Dylan for deserting his folk roots.
example.tran: 这场演出气氛紧张，观众中有人朝着迪伦大叫“犹大”，指责他抛弃了他的民歌根基。
